title: O’Connor Braces for Covadonga Vuelta Showdown: ‘It’s a Very Important Day to Be Good’
content:
A 20-second penalty to Primož Roglič gives Aussie an unexpected cushion in GC crunch-time: 'You can guarantee tomorrow he’ll go all-in to get it back.'

Read the full article at O’Connor Braces for Covadonga Vuelta Showdown: ‘It’s a Very Important Day to Be Good’ on Velo.
author: ahood
